body.p:
Maysville Ky Sept 1st 63
To His Excellency
The Governor of Kentucky,

Dear Sir, We enclose herewith a petition from Several of the leading and most influential gentlemen of Bracken & Mason Counties among them Mr Carpenter the prosecuting attorney, asking you to remit so much of the fine and penalty inflicted upon Mr Respess and myself by the Bracken Circuit Court, at its late term, as you have the power to do, your compliance with their request, will be gratefully felt and acknowledge by us.

Your obt Servants
Isaac Nelson
Thos A Respess
By Nelson
